title: Pentagon Orders Review of Its Overseas Social Media Campaigns
description: The move comes after Twitter and Facebook shut down misleading accounts that they determined were sending messages to promote U.S. foreign policy.

title: Social Media Companies Still Boost Election Fraud Claims, Report Says
description: The report, by New York University’s Stern Center for Business and Human Rights, argues that the companies fuel false conspiracies about election fraud despite promises to combat them.

title: Food Supply Disruption Is Another Front for Russian Falsehoods
description: As the war in Ukraine has put pressure on the global markets for food, Russia has spread conspiracy theories that blame the West.
